about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Engineering Technology Student
about.description: I am a passionate and skilled engineer pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering Technology with Honours in Instrumentation and Automation at the University of Colombo. With a strong foundation in automation and a diverse technical skill set, including web development, machine learning, database management, app development, UI/UX design, FPGA programming, PLC programming, IoT development, embedded systems, SolidWorks designing, and programming languages like Python, SQL, and Java, I bring a holistic approach to engineering solutions.

projects.title: Internal Fluid Flow Analysis through a Pipe System
projects.description: A Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) study conducted using SolidWorks Flow Simulation to analyze internal fluid behavior. The project involves determining key engineering parameters such as Velocity profiles, Mass Flow Rate, Pressure drops, and Temperature distribution across a bent pipe geometry under specified boundary conditions.

projects.title: Truck Tyre and Alloy Rim Assembly
projects.description: A high-fidelity 3D model of a heavy-duty vehicle tyre featuring intricate tread patterns for enhanced traction simulation. The assembly includes a detailed metallic rim with a multi-bolt mounting system, showcasing advanced circular patterning and material application in SolidWorks.

projects.title: PCB Design for Industrial Machine Vibration & Environment Logger
projects.description: A specialized Data Acquisition (DAQ) system designed for monitoring industrial machinery performance and health. This system tracks real-time vibration data alongside environmental factors like temperature and humidity. It features a custom-designed, multi-layered PCB integrated with an ESP32 microcontroller, specialized sensors, and local status indicators.

projects.title: Intricate Geometric Flowerpot
projects.description: An artistic flowerpot design created using advanced SolidWorks features. The project highlights the use of the Flex Command to create intricate twists and spiral geometries, resulting in a unique, non-linear product form.

projects.title: Stylized Automotive Alloy Wheel
projects.description: A high-end automotive wheel design featuring complex surface geometry and aesthetic spoke patterns. This project demonstrates proficiency in revolved features, circular patterns, and advanced surface finishing to achieve a realistic metallic look.

projects.title: Kitchen Drying Rack Weldment Design
projects.description: A space-saving, wall-mounted kitchen drying rack designed for efficient organization. The model features a multi-tiered frame for dish storage and integrated hooks for hanging utensils, prioritizing both structural stability and ergonomic kitchen management.

projects.title: Automotive Shock Absorber Assembly
projects.description:
This project involves the detailed 3D modeling and assembly of a mechanical shock absorber system, designed using SolidWorks. The goal was to create a functional representation of a suspension component, focusing on the integration of various mechanical parts like helical springs, telescopic rods, and gear interfaces.

Key Technical Features
Detailed Assembly Modeling: Developed a multi-part assembly including a precision-engineered helical spring, a central telescopic rod, and a gear-driven mounting base.

Material Visualization: Applied realistic material textures and color coding (Red for the spring and Metallic for the rod/gear) to distinguish between static and dynamic components.

Mechanical Precision: Focused on the alignment and mating of individual parts to ensure a realistic mechanical stroke and structural integrity within the CAD environment.

Software & Tools Used
CAD Software: SolidWorks

Modules: 3D Part Modeling, Advanced Assembly, and Appearance Rendering

projects.title: Automated Water Treatment and Bottle Filling System using Siemens PLC
projects.description:
I developed a ladder logic control program for a Water Treatment and Bottle Filling System using Siemens PLC (SIMATIC_Manager).
The design followed a flowchart-based approach to break down the process into sequential steps such as tank filling, water treatment, and bottle filling. Using 3 sensors, pumps, and a conveyor model, the system logic was mapped into ladder diagrams that ensure safe, reliable, and continuous operation.

This project demonstrates how industrial processes can be modeled and automated purely through PLC logic design, without needing full-scale hardware.

 ‚Ä¢ Tools: Siemens S7-200 PLC, SIMATIC_Manager(ladder logic)
 ‚Ä¢ Inputs (Sensors):
 ‚Ä¢ Tank level sensor
 ‚Ä¢ Bottle detection sensor (on conveyor)
 ‚Ä¢ Fill-level/overflow sensor
 ‚Ä¢ Outputs (Actuators ‚Äì simulated in logic):
 ‚Ä¢ Pumps for water circulation
 ‚Ä¢ Gate valves for flow control
 ‚Ä¢ Conveyor motor for bottle movement
 ‚Ä¢ Tower light indicators (Green/Amber/Red)
 ‚Ä¢ Control Method: Flowchart ‚Üí Sequential function steps ‚Üí Ladder logic design
 ‚Ä¢ Safety Logic: E-stop, overflow protection, low-level cut-off

projects.title: Industrial Machine Vibration & Environment Logger DAQ System
projects.description:
Industrial Machine Vibration & Environment Logger DAQ System 
Industrial Machine Vibration & Environment Logger DAQ System 
Built an IoT-based real-time monitoring and automated response system for industrial machines that tracks vibration, temperature, sound, and fire hazards to enable predictive maintenance, prevent equipment failure, and protect personnel.

üìä Project Overview:
Full-stack IoT solution: ESP32 microcontrollers, multiple sensors, automated actuators, Firebase cloud storage, and Next.js dashboard for real-time monitoring, data analytics, and automated safety responses.

üîß Hardware:
Sensors: SW-420 Vibration, DHT22 Temp/Humidity, KY-037 Sound, Flame Sensor
Actuators: Cooling Fan (L298N), Water Pump (L298N), Audio Speaker (BC547), Buzzer, 4x LEDs, LCD 16x2 Display

üí° Key Features:
‚úÖ Real-time monitoring (100ms sampling) 
‚úÖ Live Chart.js dashboard
‚úÖ Firebase cloud storage 
‚úÖ Audio voice alerts for engineers 
‚úÖ Auto responses (fan on high temp, pump on fire) 
‚úÖ CSV/PDF exports 
‚úÖ Serial & WiFi connectivity 
‚úÖ Manual/auto control modes

üí° Why Valuable:
üõ°Ô∏è Safety: Fire detection with auto water pump, multi-level alerts (LEDs, buzzer, speaker)
üìà Predictive Maintenance: Early anomaly detection, vibration analysis, temp monitoring
üí∞ Cost Savings: Reduces downtime, extends equipment life, automated cooling
üìä Data-Driven: Historical analysis, compliance reporting, real-time insights

üõ†Ô∏è Full-Stack: Embedded (ESP32), motor control (L298N), audio (PCM), cloud (Firebase), web (Next.js/React/TS)

üçΩÔ∏è¬†FOOD ORDERING SYSTEM

üöó¬†TRANSPORT¬†BOOKING SYSTEM

üìß¬†EMAIL NOTIFICATION SYSTEM

Email Service Features:
* SMTP email sending with JavaMail API

Email Templates:

üîî¬†NOTIFICATION¬†SYSTEM
In-App Notifications:

* Type-specific icons (hotel, food, transport)

üé®¬†UI/UX DESIGN & IMPLEMENTATION
Material Design 3:
* Custom color¬†scheme with¬†teal-based branding¬†(#008080)
* Consistent typography and text hierarchy
* Material components (cards, buttons, form elements)
* Smooth animations and transitions

Responsive Design:
* Adapts¬†to different screen sizes

Navigation System:

üîß¬†TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE & IMPLEMENTATION

Frontend Architecture:

Backend Architecture:

Security Features:

Performance Optimization:

* Lazy loading for¬†images and data
* Efficient memory management
* Optimized Firebase queries
* Async operations¬†for non-blocking UI

üì±¬†APP SCREENS & USER FLOW
Authentication Flow:
1. Splash Screen - Animated app introduction
2. Onboarding Screen - Multi-step¬†feature introduction
3. Login Screen - User authentication with validation
4. Signup Screen -¬†New user registration with form¬†validation

Main¬†Application Screens:
1. Home Screen -¬†Main dashboard with hotel browsing, search, and¬†filtering
2. Hotel Booking Screen - Complete booking flow with all options
3. Food Ordering Screen -¬†Restaurant menu¬†with shopping cart
4. Transport Booking Screen - Transport service booking interface
5. Profile Screen - User profile¬†with booking¬†history and¬†saved hotels
6. Settings Screen¬†- App preferences and account management
7. Edit Profile Screen - Complete profile editing with photo upload
8. Notification Screen¬†- In-app 
9. notification management

Support¬†Screens:
* Help Center Screen - Support and FAQ
* Privacy Policy¬†Screen - Legal¬†information
* Payment Methods Screen¬†- Payment management

üõ†Ô∏è¬†TECHNOLOGY STACK & DEPENDENCIES

Core Technologies:
* Kotlin - Modern¬†Android development language
* Jetpack Compose - Declarative UI framework
* Material Design 3 -¬†Latest design system
* Firebase¬†BOM 34.0.0 - Backend services platform

Firebase Services:
* Firebase Authentication (v23.2.1)¬†- User authentication
* Firebase Realtime Database - Real-time data¬†storage
* Firebase Firestore (v25.0.0) - NoSQL database
* Firebase Storage (v21.0.0) - File storage
* Firebase Cloud Messaging (v24.0.0) - Push notifications

UI & Navigation:
* Navigation Compose (v2.9.2) - Navigation system
* Coil Compose (v2.5.0) - Image loading library
* Material3 - Material Design components

Additional Libraries:
* JavaMail API (v1.6.7) - Email functionality
* Lifecycle Runtime KTX - Lifecycle management
* Play¬†Services Auth - Google authentication

üí°¬†KEY¬†ACHIEVEMENTS¬†& HIGHLIGHTS
‚úÖ Complete booking ecosystem¬†for hotel, food, and transport services
‚úÖ Real-time email notifications with professional HTML templates
‚úÖ Modern UI/UX with Material¬†Design 3 and Jetpack Compose
‚úÖ Robust¬†backend with Firebase integration
‚úÖ Secure authentication and role-based access control
‚úÖ Admin dashboard with¬†analytics and management tools
‚úÖ Scalable¬†architecture¬†ready for future enhancements
‚úÖ Production-ready code with comprehensive error handling
‚úÖ Image optimization and efficient data¬†management
‚úÖ Responsive design supporting¬†multiple screen sizes

üéØ¬†BUSINESS VALUE & IMPACT

This app demonstrates:
* End-to-end mobile app development

* Firebase backend integration

Perfect for hospitality businesses looking to digitize their booking operations and provide¬†a seamless customer experience!

projects.title: GPA Calculator App

projects.title: E-Commerce Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and secure payment integration.

projects.title: Pneumatic Product Sorting System
projects.description:
I designed ladder diagram for product sorting system using Siemens PLC and pneumatic technology. The system integrates 3 conveyor belts, 7 sensors, rodless actuator, pneumatic cylinders, an air suction pick-and-place unit, and an air gripper to detect, pick, and sort products automatically.

The complete automation cycle was first mapped with a flowchart, then programmed into a ladder logic sequence in STEP_7-Micro/WIN. The system simulates a real-world industrial sorting line used in packaging, food processing, and logistics industries.


Key Features
 ‚Ä¢ Controller: Siemens S7-200 PLC
 ‚Ä¢ Conveyors (3): Sequential transport of products across different stations
 ‚Ä¢ Sensors (7): For product detection, position verification, and safety interlocks
 ‚Ä¢ Pneumatic Actuation:
 ‚Ä¢ Rodless cylinder for linear transfer
 ‚Ä¢ Air suction unit for pick-and-place
 ‚Ä¢ Air gripper for secure handling
 ‚Ä¢ Double-acting cylinders for push/divert actions
 ‚Ä¢ Indicators: Tower lights for status (Running, Sorting, Fault)
 ‚Ä¢ Safety: Emergency stop, jam detection, and pneumatic interlocks

projects.title: Smart 3-Level Elevator Prototype
projects.description:
I designed elevator control system (using S7-200 PLC) for full flowchart, ladder logic, and on-panel status indicators. The prototype supports three floors, door interlocks, call prioritization, and emergency handling. I/O was mapped to floor call buttons, limit sensors, door sensors, motor contactors, and tower lights. The PLC executes a queue-based scheduler that minimizes travel while respecting all safety conditions.

This project demonstrates end-to-end industrial automation: requirements ‚Üí control strategy ‚Üí flowchart ‚Üí ladder program ‚Üí wiring ‚Üí testing and fault recovery. It‚Äôs a compact example of how to translate real-world motion control into reliable PLC logic.

projects.title: Smart Greenhouse Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT-based greenhouse monitoring with real-time environmental data collection, automated control systems, and sensor integration.

projects.title: Sign Language Detection System
projects.description: Real-time sign language recognition system with 90%+ accuracy supporting all 26 English letters and 10 numbers. Features advanced computer vision, modern GUI interface, and smart machine learning using Random Forest classifier.

projects.title: Face and Eye Recognizer
projects.description: Advanced computer vision system for real-time face and eye detection using MediaPipe. Features precise facial landmark detection and eye tracking capabilities for various applications.

projects.title: Real-Time Sign Language Recognition
projects.description: Deep learning-based ASL recognition system for 10 common gestures using MediaPipe hand landmarks and CNN. Achieves 99.37% accuracy on balanced, augmented dataset for inclusive HCI and accessibility.

projects.title: Scientific Calculator
projects.description: Advanced Scientific Calculator built using C# and RAD principles with MDI architecture. Features basic and scientific calculations, unit conversions, and temperature conversions. The main form acts as parent window with child forms for calculator and converters. Includes comprehensive input validation, error handling for division by zero, and user-friendly interface design. Demonstrates practical application of Rapid Application Development concepts in desktop application development.

projects.title: Line Following & Obstacle Detection Robot
projects.description: A sophisticated line-following robot with obstacle detection capabilities and an integrated robotic arm for autonomous obstacle removal. Built using ATmega328P microcontroller and tested via Proteus simulation. Features dual operating modes, PWM-based motor control, intelligent obstacle detection with 10cm range, autonomous obstacle removal via 4-servo robotic arm, adaptive speed control for curves and straight paths, visual & audio alerts with LED indicators and buzzer notifications, and mode switching with push-button control.

projects.title: Hotel Booking Website
projects.description: A full-featured hotel booking and management platform designed for both customers and hotel administrators. The system includes comprehensive room availability management, dynamic pricing algorithms, secure payment gateway integration, customer review and rating system, and advanced search filters. Features include responsive web design, real-time booking updates, email notifications, admin dashboard with analytics, inventory management, customer relationship management (CRM), multi-language support, and mobile-optimized interface for seamless user experience across all devices.

projects.title: Classroom Attendance & Gradebook System
projects.description: Digital classroom management solution with automated attendance tracking, grade calculation, student progress monitoring, and report generation. Features teacher dashboard, parent portal, and analytics integration.

projects.title: Automated Sweep Robot Using ESP-32
projects.description: Smart cleaning robot powered by ESP-32 microcontroller with WiFi connectivity, obstacle avoidance, and automated cleaning patterns. Features mobile app control, scheduling capabilities, and battery monitoring.

projects.title: Hand Operated Forklift Machine
projects.description: Innovative mechanical forklift design with manual operation system, hydraulic lifting mechanism, and ergonomic controls. Features load balancing, safety mechanisms, and precision movement control for warehouse operations.

projects.title: Smart Home Control System
projects.description: Comprehensive IoT-based home automation system with voice control, mobile app integration, and sensor-based automation. Features lighting control, temperature regulation, security monitoring, and energy management.

projects.title: Food Ordering Application
projects.description: Complete food delivery platform with restaurant listings, menu management, real-time order tracking, and payment integration. Features user reviews, delivery scheduling, and restaurant analytics dashboard.

projects.title: SolidWorks Conveyor Belt Design
projects.description: Professional conveyor belt system designed using SolidWorks with detailed 3D modeling and assembly. Features modular components, belt tensioning mechanisms, and motor mounting systems. Includes engineering drawings and manufacturing documentation. Demonstrates advanced CAD modeling skills and mechanical engineering concepts.
